settings.product_body:
A memory foam pillow created to give you the freedom to adjust height and firmness as you please. It’s suitable for all types of sleeping positions because you can mix-and-match layers for your personal preferences:

The top layer is the support layer (on the firmer side), the middle layer is the comfort layer (breathable and soft), and the bottom layer is the adaptive layer (medium-firm memory foam). All foams are wrapped up in a washable, non-toxic, vegan, and hypoallergenic cover.

settings.scale_title: What does an Emma mattress feel like?
settings.scale_description: Emma mattresses are in the medium-firm range, which means you’ll be sleeping in cloudy comfort with just the right amount of support!

settings.question: Materials and Care
settings.answer: Our foam pillows are made with breathable and adaptive Airgocell® foam, visco-elastic memory foam, and temperature neutralizing foam. Other materials include removable and washable top cover out of 98% polyester and 2% elastane. To wash, simply remove the cover and throw it into the washing machine with a gentle soap.

settings.question: Return Policy
settings.answer:
Easy Return

Enjoy a 100-nights free trial on your Emma Pillow. We typically require an adjustment period of at least 3 weeks as our researchers confirm that it takes around that long to get suited to your Emma product. Of course, we've made returning any unsuitable items super easy. Just contact our customer service and we'll take care of the rest. Our returns are of course completely free.

settings.answer: Each Emma mattress also comes with a 10-year guarantee- that’s how sure of the quality we are.
